title: Our time
creator_credit: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: For Evangelos Thiveos, time with the family is centred around dinner time, where everyone gets to talk about their day, while ‘stuffing their faces’ with the copious amounts of food prepared earlier.
creator_credit_for_label: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
